custom-sql.sql: SELECT {Chat_Entry.*} FROM Chat_Entry WHERE (fromUserId = ?) AND (toUserId = ?) AND (content = '' OR content IS NULL) ORDER BY createDate DESC
SELECT {Chat_Entry.*} FROM Chat_Entry WHERE ( (fromUserId = ?) OR (toUserId = ?) ) AND (flag = ?) ORDER BY createDate DESC
SELECT {Chat_Entry.*} FROM Chat_Entry WHERE (createDate < ?) ORDER BY createDate DESC

SELECT User_.userId AS userId, User_.screenName AS screenName, User_.firstName AS firstName, User_.middleName AS middleName, User_.lastName AS lastName, User_.portraitId AS portraitId, Chat_Status.awake AS awake FROM Chat_Status INNER JOIN User_ ON (User_.userId = Chat_Status.userId) WHERE (User_.companyId = ?) AND (User_.userId != ?) AND (Chat_Status.modifiedDate > ?) AND (Chat_Status.online_ = [$TRUE$]) ORDER BY Chat_Status.awake ASC, User_.firstName ASC, User_.middleName ASC, User_.lastName ASC

SELECT DISTINCT User_.userId AS userId, User_.screenName AS screenName, User_.firstName AS firstName, User_.middleName AS middleName, User_.lastName AS lastName, User_.portraitId AS portraitId, Chat_Status.awake AS awake FROM Chat_Status INNER JOIN User_ ON (User_.userId = Chat_Status.userId) INNER JOIN SocialRelation ON (SocialRelation.userId2 = User_.userId) WHERE (SocialRelation.userId1 = ?) AND [$SOCIAL_RELATION_TYPES$] (Chat_Status.modifiedDate > ?) AND (Chat_Status.online_ = [$TRUE$]) AND (User_.userId != ?) ORDER BY Chat_Status.awake ASC, User_.firstName ASC, User_.middleName ASC, User_.lastName ASC

SELECT DISTINCT User_.userId AS userId, User_.screenName AS screenName, User_.firstName AS firstName, User_.middleName AS middleName, User_.lastName AS lastName, User_.portraitId AS portraitId, Chat_Status.awake AS awake FROM Chat_Status INNER JOIN User_ ON (User_.userId = Chat_Status.userId) INNER JOIN Users_Groups ON (Users_Groups.userId = User_.userId) WHERE (Users_Groups.groupId IN ( SELECT Users_Groups.groupId FROM Users_Groups [$USERS_GROUPS_JOIN$] WHERE (userId = ?) [$USERS_GROUPS_WHERE$] ) ) AND (Chat_Status.modifiedDate > ?) AND (Chat_Status.online_ = [$TRUE$]) AND (User_.userId != ?) ORDER BY Chat_Status.awake ASC, User_.firstName ASC, User_.middleName ASC, User_.lastName ASC
